trans-unit.source: Contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> for each property that the WPF supports.

The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ships with pre-defined <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> objects for properties that are commonly collected by a stylus and a digitizer.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]隨附預先定義的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>屬性通常會收集的手寫筆和數位板的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use these built-in properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些內建屬性，來建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties> fields.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties>欄位。

trans-unit.source: Represents the angle between the axis of the pen and the surface of the Tablet PC.
The value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.AltitudeOrientation> is 0 when the pen is parallel to the surface and 90 when the pen is perpendicular to the surface.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.AltitudeOrientation>畫筆時平行的介面和 90，表面垂直畫筆時為 0。

trans-unit.source: The values are negative when the pen is inverted.
trans-unit.target: 當畫筆反轉的值是負的。

trans-unit.source: Represents the clockwise rotation of the cursor, through a full circular range around the z-axis.
Represents the barrel button of a stylus.
Represents the pressure on a pressure-sensitive button.
Represents the height of the contact point on the digitizer.
The height of the contact point depends on the type of instrument that is used.
trans-unit.target: 連絡點的高度取決於檢測所使用的型別。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Height> can vary when Touch is used.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Height>使用觸控時而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Represents the pressure of the pen tip perpendicular to the Tablet PC surface.
Represents the current status of the cursor.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.PacketStatus> field contains one or more of the following flag values in a bit field.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.PacketStatus>欄位包含一或多個下列位元欄位中的旗標值。

trans-unit.source: Use bit operators to check the status of these values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用位元運算子來檢查這些值的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The cursor is touching the drawing surface (Value = 1).
trans-unit.target: 資料指標接觸的繪圖介面 (值 = 1)。

trans-unit.source: The cursor is inverted.
trans-unit.target: 資料指標會被反轉。

trans-unit.source: For example, the eraser end of the pen is pointing toward the surface (Value = 2).
trans-unit.target: 畫筆橡皮擦結尾，例如指向介面 (值 = 2)。

trans-unit.source: Not used (Value = 4).
trans-unit.target: 不使用 (值 = 4)。

trans-unit.source: The barrel button is pressed (Value = 8).
trans-unit.target: 按下鸃庢餂鈕 (值 = 8)。

trans-unit.source: Represents whether the tip is above or below a horizontal line that is perpendicular to the writing surface.
This requires a three-dimensional digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 這需要三維數位板。

trans-unit.source: The value is positive if the tip is above the line and negative if it is below the line.
trans-unit.target: 值是正數，如果提示高於該線和負數，如果它低於該線。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you hold the pen in front of you and write on an imaginary wall, the pitch is positive if the tip is above a line extending from you to the wall.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果在保存您面前畫筆，撰寫虛數牆上的音高大約是正數，如果提示是從您延伸到牆上一行上面。

trans-unit.source: Represents the clockwise rotation of the pen around its own axis.
This requires a three-dimensional digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 這需要三維數位板。

trans-unit.source: Represents the secondary tip button of a stylus.
Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
You can use this value to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> from the packet queue.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此值來擷取<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>從封包佇列。

trans-unit.source: Represents the point of contact that generates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />, whether initiated by a finger, palm, or any other touch.
Represents the pen tip pressure along the plane of the Tablet PC surface.
The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.TangentPressure> field represents pressure along the plane of the Tablet PC surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.TangentPressure>欄位代表壓力沿著 Tablet PC 介面的平面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> field represents pressure perpendicular to the plane of the Tablet PC surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>欄位代表垂直 Tablet PC 介面的平面不足的壓力。

trans-unit.source: Represents the tip button of a stylus.
Represents the clockwise rotation of the cursor around its own axis.
Represents the width of the contact point on the digitizer.
The width of the contact point depends on the type of instrument that is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用檢測類型而定的連絡點的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Width> can vary when touch is used.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Width>使用觸控時而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Represents the x-coordinate in the tablet coordinate space.
Represents the angle between the (<paramref name="y,z" />) plane and the pen and y-axis plane.
Represents the y-coordinate in the tablet coordinate space.
Represents the angle of the pen to the left or right around the center of its horizontal axis when the pen is horizontal.
This requires a three-dimensional digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 這需要三維數位板。

trans-unit.source: If you hold the pen in front of you and write on an imaginary wall, zero yaw indicates that the pen is perpendicular to the wall.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在按住畫筆在虛數牆上的寫入，零繞表示畫筆牆面垂直。

trans-unit.source: The value is negative if the tip is to the left of perpendicular and positive if the tip is to the right of perpendicular.
trans-unit.target: 值為負數，如果左邊的垂直筆的提示且正數，如果秘訣是垂直方向的右側。

trans-unit.source: Represents the angle between the (x, z) plane and the pen and x-axis plane.
This applies to a pen cursor.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於畫筆游標。

trans-unit.source: The value is 0 when the pen is perpendicular to the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: 描繪垂直畫筆時，值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The value is positive when the pen is upward or away from the user.
trans-unit.target: 畫筆向上或離開使用者時，這個值是正數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the z-coordinate or distance of the pen tip from the tablet surface.
